text: aur (jab moosa mahal mein lae gae to) phiraun kee beebee (aasiya apane shauhar se) bolee ki ye meree aur tumhaaree (donon kee) onkhon kee thandak hai to tum log isako qatl na karo kya ajab hai ki ye hamako nafa pahunchae ya ham use le paalak hee bana len aur unhen (usee ke haath se barbaad hone kee) khabar na thee
